DOC.HEAD: PUBLISHERS:
MANAGING EDITORS:
ADVERTISING MANAGERS:
DOC.TEXT: Coming up on this wire is AP's Special Edition, ``Bride & Groom.'' Each of the 13 stories (b1336-b1348) in this package will be transmitted with a b1000-series designator, ``a'' priority and category codes and a BC-SPE slug. Six photos moved over the LaserPhoto network early Sunday morning, Dec. 17 (AP LaserPhotos NY700-NY705). They will not be repeated. Prints are available by mail at $5 per photo. Call (212) 621-1820. For re-runs on any or all package stories, please call AP's Service Desk at (212) 621-1595. Editors of Special Edition are Sibby Christensen, (212) 757-3488, and Gene Schroeder, (212) 621-1853. The ``Bride & Groom'' Special Edition contains these stories: b1336 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Story of a Wedding (LaserPhotos NY700, NY701) b1337 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: The Ceremony (LaserPhoto NY702) b1338 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: A Catered Affair (LaserPhoto NY703) b1339 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: The Alcohol Question b1340 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Wedding Cost b1341 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Marriage Demographics b1342 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Talk First b1343 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: The Ring b1344 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Looking Good b1345 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Showers b1346 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Travel b1347 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Brites (LaserPhoto NY704) b1348 BC-SPE--Bride & Groom: Briefs (LaserPhoto NY705)
